originalTitle: Kenya's border with Somalia set to re-open after almost 15 years
title: Kenya's border with Somalia set to re-open after almost 15 years
content: Somali Islamist militant group al-Shabab has staged several attacks in Kenya, prompting the border to be closed.

originalTitle: Port city in ruins as storm rips through Madagascar and on towards Mozambique
title: Port city in ruins as storm rips through Madagascar and on towards Mozambique
content: More than half the population is affected and most infrastructure destroyed in Toamasina, Madagascar's main port.

originalTitle: At least 21 dead after boat sinks on Sudan's River Nile
title: At least 21 dead after boat sinks on Sudan's River Nile
content: Search efforts are continuing for the missing passengers, who included children.

originalTitle: CCTV video captures moment sinkhole swallows road in Shanghai
title: CCTV video captures moment sinkhole swallows road in Shanghai
content: CCTV video captured the moment a huge sinkhole swallowed part of a busy road in Shanghai, China on Wednesday.

originalTitle: Unofficial results show BNP ahead in Bangladesh election
title: Unofficial results show BNP ahead in Bangladesh election
content: Unofficial results in the Bangladesh election suggest that the Bangladesh Nationalist Party is leading.

originalTitle: Trump calls Israel’s president ‘disgraceful’ for not pardoning Netanyahu
title: Trump calls Israel’s president ‘disgraceful’ for not pardoning Netanyahu
content: The US president tells reporters that Isaac Herzog should be 'ashamed' for not pardoning Netanyahu's bribery charges.

originalTitle: Trump revokes landmark ruling that greenhouse gases endanger public health
title: Trump revokes landmark ruling that greenhouse gases endanger public health
content: The White House calls it the largest deregulation in US history, but environmentalists say it will prove costly for Americans.

originalTitle: Minnesota immigration enforcement surge is ending, Trump border tsar says
title: Minnesota immigration enforcement surge is ending, Trump border tsar says
content: Two US citizens were killed in Minneapolis during the crackdown dubbed "Operation Metro Surge".

originalTitle: Kim Jong Un chooses teen daughter as heir, says Seoul
title: Kim Jong Un chooses teen daughter as heir, says Seoul
content: South Korea's spy agency says Ki Ju Ae's prominent public presence indicates she is the chosen heir.

originalTitle: England to face Spain and Croatia in Nations League
title: England to face Spain and Croatia in Nations League
content: England will face Spain, Croatia and the Czech Republic in the 2026-27 Uefa Nations League group stage, while Wales are drawn with holders Portugal.

originalTitle: Tuchel deal delights FA - but timing has echoes of Capello decision
title: Tuchel deal delights FA - but timing has echoes of Capello decision
content: The FA is celebrating England head coach Thomas Tuchel's new deal as a coup - but the timing revives memories of its Fabio Capello blunder, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

originalTitle: NI relish 'competitive' Nations League draw - O'Neill
title: NI relish 'competitive' Nations League draw - O'Neill
content: Northern Ireland manager Michael O'Neill says "there are no easy games" in the Nations League after being drawn with Hungary, Ukraine and Georgia.
